divs: sighting detailsi was driving west on i-40 perhaps an hr. west of the n.m\az border....i had stopped to take photgraphs of the sunrise......the image attached was shot from a knoll on the side of i-40. at the time of the shoot i did not see anything, although the night before had sighted something several times just west of albequerque n.m. the image became apparent during post processing when i enlarged the frame to a 100% of its value.....i do not know what it is....i have had four sightings in my life time, this would be 5 and the first recorded image if indeed it is an et craft. my feelings about the subject are enthusiastic, i believe whole-heartedly that we are not alone, though i have only speculation as to the interest of these craft and et's........as i said the night before this occurance, i watched a bright object-very illuminated over the traffic just outside albequerque n.m.....it eventuall slid away and 10 minuets later ...popped! dierctly in front and above me perhaps 3-4000 feet; the light was phenomenal and the shape somewhat star-like......i drove under the object and continued on my way without incident.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Holbrook
There were no other sightings in Holbrook on or around February 23rd 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
